candidate Profile Description.summary: A highly driven Data Science professional with a demonstrated history of working in software development and machine learning. Strong academic background with a Master of Science in Data Science and a Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Telecommunication. Proficient in Python, C++, Java and database management systems. Skilled in using machine learning algorithms.

education.institution: Pace University, Seidenberg School of Computer Science and Information Systems
education.degree: Master of Science (MS) in Data Science

education.institution: RTM Nagpur University, Yeshwantrao Chavan College of Engineering
education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering (BE) in Electronics and Telecommunication

projects.name: Laptop Price Prediction Model Utilizing Random Forest
projects.description: Performed comprehensive exploratory data analysis (EDA) using Matplotlib and Seaborn
achievements: Implemented the Random Forest algorithm using Scikit-Learn, achieving a prediction accuracy of 92% for laptop prices
Executed data preprocessing tasks to enhance model robustness

projects.name: Prediction and Classification of Diabetes Diseases Using Machine Learning Algorithms
projects.description: Led a four-member team in developing Machine Learning Models based on a dataset from two real-world hospitals
achievements: Achieved a 98% accuracy rate utilizing the Random Forest algorithm
Authored and presented a research paper at IEEE BECITHCON 2021

projects.name: Classification of Fake News using NLP Vectorization Techniques and Machine Learning Algorithms
projects.description: Implemented Natural Language Processing techniques and machine learning algorithms to classify fake news
achievements: Achieved a 92% accuracy with the Decision Tree algorithm to detect and determine misinformation online
Published as a chapter in a book by Springer

work_experience.title: Senior Analyst/Software Engineer
responsibilities: Collaborated with a team of 5 in the development of a full-stack application
Developed a Model View Controller (MVC) project using .Net Core Web API, SQL Server, and Angular, and deployed on Azure
Conducted REST API testing with Swagger and Postman

leaderships.name: ICON (conducted by Yeshwantrao Chavan College of Engineering)
leaderships.description: Spearheaded the planning and execution of ICON 21.0 as a part of the Event Management Committee

certifications.title: British Airways Data Science Job Simulation
